summary:
Professional Marketing Manager with a decade of experience and a demonstrated track record of end-to-end marketing strategies (from ideation to execution). Extremely well-versed in digital marketing, data analysis, and strategic thinking. A meticulous project manager, balancing multiple deadlines, while maintaining an organised, yet creative approach. Works well independently and within a team. Possesses strong interpersonal skills that communicate effectively at all levels with partners, clients, and colleagues alike, that thrives on responsibility and challenge. An energetic individual with strong business acumen and the ability to transcend business goals.

Let's connect at toh.yu.jun@hotmail.com and have a chat over coffee about driving more business revenue through Marketing.

treasury_media.title: First Aquila 70 Power Catamaran Sold in Asia as The Brand Expands Worldwide
treasury_media.description: Starting the new year with First Aquila 70 sale into Asia. The Southeast Asia Market has been performing excellently with an Aquila 54 Yacht slated to arrive Thailand later this year, Singapore with three orders for Aquila 36 Sports within a span of few weeks with a brand new Aquila 44 sold in the first days of 2022, and a very successful Asia launch of the new Aquila 28 Molokai was recently held in Malaysia with the boat immediately sold afterwards.

treasury_media.title: Simpson Marine Reinforces Position as Market Leader in Asia in 2020
treasury_media.description: Simpson Marine, Asia’s leading yacht sales and services company, reports a very busy year in 2020 with sales of over 200 million USD and 112 new and pre-owned yachts sold in 2020. Founded in 1984 by Mike Simpson, over the years Simpson Marine has gone from strength to strength, cementing its position as market leader in Asia.

treasury_media.title: Sanlorenzo Asia Takes Order for a New Build Sanlorenzo 52Steel Superyacht
treasury_media.description: Sanlorenzo Asia, a division of Simpson Marine, is delighted to announce the sale of a new build Sanlorenzo 52Steel superyacht. A sale that signifies a milestone being the largest Sanlorenzo sold in Asia to date.

treasury_media.title: Sanlorenzo Indonesia Starts the Year on a Positive Note
treasury_media.description: Sanlorenzo Asia represented by Simpson Marine is delighted to announce the sale of a new Sanlorenzo SL78 into Indonesia. Arriving in Indonesia in March 2021 the SL78 will add to the growing fleet of Sanlorenzo yachts in the region. This sale marks a strong beginning to the new year for the Sanlorenzo brand in Asia, following a very successful 2020.

publications.name: First Asia Sold Sanlorenzo SL102Asymmetric Arrives in Singapore
Successful Malaysia Premiere for Sanlorenzo SL86

profile_positions.description:
● Provide sound suggestions to website, content and web management for an improved user's experience. Resulted in 21.35% increase in website visitors and an overall 22.53% increase in new users to website. 200% increase in organic leads
● Manages six Facebook pages with frequent postings and creative contents which resulted in an increase in likes and followers across all pages
● Implemented Facebook Advertising and campaigns which drives an uptake in direct enquiries
● YouTube uplift to channel with strategic YouTube campaigns that resulted in 46% increase in subscribers
● Successfully foster strong media relationships to aid company's branding and editorial features across Southeast Asia region
● Built strong connection with luxury partners such as Rolls-Royce, Jaeger-LeCoultre, GRAFF, Infinity Jewels, Shih Yun Art, Daum & Haviland, Baccarat, Dalmore Whisky, Krayon Watches, Knights Frank Malaysia for cross data-base activations across regions
● Increased company's revenue by three folds in two year's time with significant number of new yacht sales which includes largest Superyacht sold into Singapore, largest fleet of Aquila Power Catamaran in Singapore, and penetrated key brand Sanlorenzo into Southeast Asia region
● Increased 317.3% quality leads within a year through various strategic marketing methods
● Accounted for 23.5% of Sanlorenzo’s total global sales in 2020
● Successfully managed four Southeast Asia markets (Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand & Indonesia) with USD $80,000 budget projects and achieved over USD $200 million reported sales in 2020
profile_positions.title: Regional Marketing Manager (S.E.A)

profile_positions.description:
● Directed the creation, work processes and implementation of annual marketing plans
● In charge of company's overall collateral and marketing materials as key sales tools 
● Organised, coordinate, supervise and execute numerous sales events with Google Asia Pacific which drives significant sales figure to the company
● Generated prospects and quality leads through various digital marketing channels such as Search Engine Marketing (Google Ads), Facebook Advertising and Content Management that attributes to Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) ranking
● Leads nurturing and implement customer retention programme
● Successfully proposed and implemented incentive mechanics with support from Google Singapore to uplift internal sales drive and colleague's welfare
● In charge of corporate tie-ups with other B2B organisations (i.e. UOB SME Exchange Program, SFIC, CRIB Society, UOB-FinLab)
● Responsible for Webantics Malaysia's Marketing plans and strategies. Successfully tie-up with Malaysia Hotels Associations (MAH) & Maxis Malaysia for leads and sales acquisition
● Double-up as account manager for selection accounts and contributed to department's overall 40% growth through targeted up-selling
● Brought in $1.08 million to company's revenue in the first year. Revenue contribution is 108% increase compared to the previous year's through effective marketing strategies and campaigns
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketing Executive

profile_positions.description:
● Identify angles for key media pitches to maximise press coverage. Successful media features includes Lianhe Wanbao, Lianhe Zaobao, TODAY, Straits Times, Mediacorp, Channel News Asia, August Man, Singapore Child, Teenage, Motherhood, Wardrobe Trend Fashion to name a few
● Establish connection between brands and suitable influencers/KOLs for campaign launches
● In charge of proposals to clients which successfully converted 100% of prospect to clients
● Spearheaded the launch of Lucozade Sport Orange in Singapore
● Successfully lead in Suntory, Depend, Galderma, Oilily and The Bespoke Club accounts
● Achieved an overall $100,000 return of investment for each account
profile_positions.title: Senior Public Relations Executive

profile_positions.description:
● Develop new business connections to gain market entry that brings in new revenue stream
● Successfully retain Underwater World in SIC agents’ 2014 itinerary which brought in over 50,000 pax of visitors
● Supervision of Education department. Provides training and guiding of new staff. Decision maker for all educational related programs and enquiries
● Created and service new travel agents to encourage overseas student group visits
● Identify new contacts for school visits that increases Education programs take-up rates significantly
● Expanded per person yield through add-on F&B component that resulted in a minimum of $20,000 additional revenue 
● Achieved more than 100% increase in sales for Vietnam market less than one year in charged of the market
● Successfully converted 29 out of 34 enquires into actual sales for Education department
● Proposed and implemented a series of short term promotions and projects to boost sales. Example: Penetrated into a new market during Chinese New Year targeting on dormitory/foreign worker as a new audience market that resulted in 2,430 sales over a spread of 8 days; “Pay-your-child’s age” promotion for June Holiday 2014 that brought in an increase in sales figure compared to same time period
● Contributed to company’s 40% primary sales revenue
